mapper.insert: insert into t_admin_user (user_id, customer_code, customer_password, sale_code, sale_password, mobile, real_name, idcard, address, create_date, modify_date, role_code, login_mode) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{roleCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{loginMode,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update:
update t_admin_user
customer_code = #{customerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
customer_password = #{customerPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_code = #{saleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sale_password = #{salePassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
real_name = #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
role_code = #{roleCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
login_mode = #{loginMode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM t_admin_user where sale_code=#{saleCode} and sale_password=#{salePassword}
SELECT * FROM t_admin_user where customer_code=#{customerCode} and customer_password=#{customerPassword}
